descrizione: Teaching Portal of the Polytechnic University of Turin

navbar.anticipo_fine_lezione_descrizione: Today's lesson will end half an hour early.

piano_carriera.description: Completion or modification of the career plan and/or the teaching load, enrollment in the new academic year.

gestione_carriera.title: Career Management
gestione_carriera.description: Request for approval of external activities and modification of career status.

apply.title: Apply@polito
apply.description: View and check the status of your career.

laurea_ed_esame_finale.title: Degree and Final Examination
laurea_ed_esame_finale.description: View the status of the thesis and the steps to obtain the title.

proposta_di_tesi.errore_proposta_di_tesi: Error while rendering the thesis proposal
proposta_di_tesi.modal_contenuto: Are you sure you want to apply for this thesis proposal?

tesi.title: Thesis
tesi.section_description: Section dedicated to managing your thesis, with the ability to upload the final work and track the evaluation status.
tesi.error: Error while rendering the active thesis

progress_application.pending_description: Your application has been correctly submitted and is under review by the supervisor. During this period, you cannot yet view the outcome or details of the evaluation. The system will send an automatic notification as soon as the evaluation procedure is completed.
progress_application.approved_description: Your application has been evaluated positively by the supervisor and is approved. You are now authorized to proceed with the subsequent obligations provided for in the thesis initiation process, following the timing and methods indicated by the regulations.
progress_application.rejected_description: The supervisor has expressed a negative opinion regarding the application submitted, which is therefore rejected. You have the opportunity to consult any reasons or additional notes entered by the supervisor by accessing the activity history section directly.
progress_application.canceled_description: You have decided to withdraw this application. As a result, the thesis proposal is no longer under evaluation and cannot be considered by the supervisor. If you wish, you can submit a new application for another available thesis proposal.
progress_application.outcome_description: In questa sezione verrà visualizzato il giudizio definitivo espresso dal docente relatore al termine della fase istruttoria. Lo studente riceverà una comunicazione formale non appena i risultati saranno resi pubblici e disponibili per la consultazione.

page_not_found.title: Page not found
page_not_found.message: The requested page does not exist or is not available.
